Room.Name: Melbourne Entertainment Arena - Entrance Foyer
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the main entrance foyer into the Melbourne Entertainment Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The Melbourne Entertainment Arena has two levels of difficulty. To the north is the entrance to the Beginner's Circle, where young warriors can get acquainted with the various criminals and vermin of Oceancrest. To the east is the Center Ring arena where just about anything can happen. The fighting rages from within both areans, beckoning you to enter.
